title: Clear Cutting Effects to Hydrologic Cycle

content.prompt: Which of the following changes to the local hydrologic cycle will result if large areas of land experienced clear-cutting?

choices.label: Transpiration of water from vegetation will increase.
Evaporation of water from the soil will increase.
Siltation of local streams will decrease.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
